Header: Anura Senanayaka granted bail after one year
Content: Former Senior DIG Anura Senanayake who was in remand for over a year for allegedly concealing evidence linked to the murder of ruggerite Wasim Thajudeen, has been released on strict bail conditions. The suspect was released on one million rupees cash bail and three surety bails of 5 million rupees. The Judge ordered that one of such sureties should be a close relative of the suspect.
